Error.val: None of supported source controls is enabled in settings. The report will not contain any source control references.

Problem.msg: The test configuration contains the following deprecated rules, which will be removed in future releases:

Error.val: The rule BD.PB.INTOVERF has been deprecated and should be replaced with BD.PB.INTWRAP, BD.PB.INTDL, BD.PB.INTVC in your test configuration.
The rule OOM.MLCI has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.IDOC in your test configuration.
The rule APSC_DV.002590.INTOVERF is mapped from BD.PB.INTOVERF, which has been deprecated and should be replaced with BD.PB.INTWRAP, BD.PB.INTDL, BD.PB.INTVC.
The rule CS.MLC has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.NOPLIM in your test configuration.
The rule CS.OOM.MI has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.MI in your test configuration.
The rule GC.DCGC has been deprecated and should be replaced with SEC.APDM in your test configuration.
The rule OOM.LNPM has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.NOPAR in your test configuration.
The rule OOM.LNMM has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.NOMIT in your test configuration.
The rule OOM.CYCLO has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.MCC in your test configuration.
The rule OOM.LNPVM has been deprecated and should be replaced with METRIC.NOPRIVMIT in your test configuration.

Problem.msg: Some static analysis rules are not supported for .NET Core/.NET Standard projects and were not executed during the analysis. See the dotTEST User Guide for the list of supported rules.
